title: Think it's time we did a gender reveal

comments.comment: So unreal to think Felix is gonna have a child running around in his videos soon.
Well the Koinobori hint confirms it, ITS A BOY. Carp streamers were originally flown as part of Japanese Boys day with a carp representing each son for those unaware. What a beautiful way to reveal.
It's been an honor to have grown up watching PewDiePie, and now to see him start a family is truly heartwarming
The child is going to be half Swedish, half Italian but growing up in Japan. That's cool. I'm curious what name the kid is going to have.
From teen boy playing horror games and screaming at barrels to having a family really makes you think just fast life goes by, congratulations Felix and Marzia, you both will be great parents
Watching this channel is like watching an epilogue for a man that unlocked the Good Ending of YouTube
Man this guy completed life. Living in Japan with his dream wife, getting baby boy soon, still uploading videos as a hobby. Crazy how far he’s come.

For a creator whose content had so much impact within my life growing up, I deeply value how Felix’s content is maturing  overtime the same way we are all growing older. It truly makes you think about how long of a ride its been
marzia really has an eye for art. been very impressed by her editing direction

I’m tearing up, man. Not just from the video but reading through the comments as well. We were all kids when we started watching Pewds and now we are all just sharing their happiness as adults. You’ve helped millions of us through so much, Felix and Marzia. You deserve the entire world and I hope your new family will bring you infinite joy

it feels so unreal that ive simply grown up with him. from being a small child watching him do Fridays with PewDiePie and play amnesia to now being all grown up* seeing him becoming a true family man, getting married and having a kid soon. this makes me feel so nostalgic yet so happy for him. it's such an honor getting to watch him grow like this.
Watching these videos edited by Marzia makes me feel the same kind of happiness i had as a kid when times were easier

After all this time, Im constantly reminded that Felix found his happiness. He's fulfilled. There's nothing better than watching someone achieve their goals and feel happy with their life.

Edit: "Nothing better than" is a figure of speech, but apparently being genuinely happy for someone else is a concept too hard to grasp for most internet users.

It’s a boy! Koinobori streamers are for the Children’s Day(the Boys Day)on May 5th. The family with a boy puts up the streamer on a pole in front of the house to celebrate it. Usually there are 4 to 5 fish on it to represent dad, mom, brother and sister. Also the size are sightless different and colors are different. They are black, red, blue, pink or any other colors.
Man it’s crazy to think I started watching this man back in 2012 playing custom stories on amnesia to seeing him and the love of his life grow and make a family I love you pewds congrats

Thank you Felix & Marzia for coming to our cafe It's crazy as the owner of the cafe and being long time fan of yours to actually see you in one of our pig cafe. I flip out since I even didn't know you came until watching this video. Anyway, a big congratulations for the

Felix and Marzia are the closest thing to a real life fairlytale.
I am genuinely so happy for them. All the people should look up to them.
All these vlogs seeing Felix and Marzia settle down in Japan and form a family never fails to make me emotional as a fan who's been watching Felix's journey since his small flat in Sweden.
grew up watchin him. just recently had my own child... and i cannot express how happy and proud of Pewds i am.

I feel like ive watched his whole life and career from the span of my preteens to 22.  It’s a really weird feeling to get this emotional for him, Marzia and their baby even though I’ve never met them.

There's something so wholesome about pewds' vlogs now. Moved to Japan, having a casual upload schedule with more vlogs and focusing on spending time with his family. This is the way legends should settle down.
Each day that passes Felix looks more and more like his Father, specially with those glasses, and it's kinda wholesome to see, considering he is going to be a father now too

That's one heck of a unique gender reveal. And I'm crying cause although I'm younger than you, I feel so proud of how you grew up to be such a good man. You didn't let the fame ruin you.

I still can't believe actually watched you grow. I do miss your horror game videos but that's fine, I'm still here and I love these vlogs. This is so wholesome. I'm very very emotional about that gender reveal. 

And TBH I expected a girl but a boy means we will soon have a Pewdiepie 2.0
Man, it’s crazy how happy these vlogs make you feel, like you’re sharing their happiness.

My eyes teared up when I read the title. I've been a subscriber since middle school, and I know you get this alot, but I still gotta say you are a very significant part of my life. It's so wild to see your journey come this far, congrats Pewds.
Marzia's editing style makes me feel like I'm watching a cozy anime about the life of Felix Kjellberg.
I would love to know if Felix and Marzia will teach their child English, Italian, Swedish, and Japanese. And if so, how they plan on going about it.
crazy to think i was 21 watching you screaming at barrels, now im 32 with a wife and kids, and now i get to watch you have a family with children as well. your bros are growing up with you.

Okay after google search : IT’S A BOY !! Those fish flags are for the celebration of Children’s day in Japan. Nowadays they symbolize good wishes for both boy and girls but this holiday is still referred casually as “Boy’s day” :))) congratulations Marcia and Pewds !
It’s so nice of Pewds to help take care of Felix’s child. Seeing the two of them collab like this is incredible
I just love these feel good videos. It's like seeing an old friend and observing how far they've come. Congrats on your kid Felix. Love that you used Koinbori flags for the gender reveal.

Being a fan of pewdiepie for over nine years and then seeing him making videos about how great life is to finally be setlled in.. it makes me tear up a little. We're all so happy for you, thank you for the memories
Reading all these kind comments on this video is so wholesome. It's so beautiful how happy you guys are and how happy everyone watching is. Sending a virtual hug to everybody.
I love how Marzia edits  is so calming and cozy
I can't help but be happy and tear up with every vlog felix makes, he's in such a happy and light mood
It’s unbelievable how far Pewdiepie has come, after raising a whole generation he’s now settling down to raise a child of his own. Congratulations Felix.

According to Google, here is the gender for Pewds and Marzia's baby:

On May 5, Japanese people celebrate the health and happiness for boys. It's known as “Tango no Sekku” or “Kodomo no Hi”(Children's Day).
It's so nice of Pewds to help take care of Felix's child. Seeing the two of them collab like this is awesome
Im so jealous of this man!! Look at him just chilling, enjoying life, and raising a family at leisure. Like how life was meant to be lived. So happy for him.

For people who don’t know in May, its a holiday in honor of the Children's Day (originally the Boys' festival) on May 5. In Japanese culture, the carp symbolizes courage and strength because of its ability to swim up a waterfall. So basically it’s a boy!!! Congrats you guys I’m so glad to see you guys happy
I dunno why Im so happy and smiling for these two strangers that have been a part of my life from afar without ever knowing irl for years and years.

Felix, I just had to hop in and say, what a fucking journey brother. Went from getting home everyday after school watching you scream and get scared at horror games, bringing around memories I'll never forget, some great memes, laughs, and sad times turned happy.  I'm glad we could be apart of this journey with you to watch you flourish and grow and allowing us a peek into your world for so long and today for such an occasion. Salute to you and Marzia. Congrats, with all the love - T
I just realized he's leaving memories for his family to look back on in the style of old home videos. Amazing.
Dude has become a role model to an entire generation through success and failure he’s shown how to improve  and that he has improved. Lots of love from wales

congratulations on the baby boy, felix & marzia!!! it's incredible to think about you two having a baby and becoming even more of a family and I still remember felix playing horror games in 2013 and cursing in Swedish. we've grown so much. i was 12-13 then and now im 23. I'm so happy and feel so lucky and thankful that I get to see your family journey and growth. congratulations, again. <3
Been following you since I was 12 years old, today I tested up watching your channel again. Hadn’t seen your videos in 3 years now, I’m happy for you pewds
I love how rather than just telling us the gender he gets everyone to learn just a little piece of Japanese culture while doing so.

In a time where all mainstream content has to be so upbeat in your face action-packed all the time it's so nice seeing a laid-back vlog that seems genuine all throughout. It's authentic and refreshing, I like
It’s incredibly kind of them to give us sneak peeks into their life, especially when they’ve found peace in the place they deserve to be
I love the way the gender reveal is. y'all are precious. My heart feels happy

Watching Pewds go from playing amnesia in Sweden to the vlogs on his life in Japan have been a hell of a journey and I couldn't be more happy for Pewds and Marzia, Its so wholesome to see what a wonderful life they have and I wish them all the best. Congrats Felix and Marzia, and Momo and Edgar
Congrats!! You're having a baby boy!!!! Koinobori, (May 5th) symbolizes parents' wishes for their sons to be as strong as a carp You guys are going to be great parents!!

The fact that, most of us have been watching this man since our childhoods, and we have seen him through different times of his life, it's so beautiful to see him and Marzia go this far in life, it's truly beautiful to see and can even make you emotional, these videos legit got me thinking about life. Stay happy man, you are a legend
Imagine if they name their son Stephano, that would be nostalgic
Boys are sooooo sweettt! Ugh so happy for you both <3

This is making me want to cry but in a good way. I've been watching you since I was at least 12. I'm 23 now and dude it feels so surreal to see you as an upcoming dad. I'm so happy for you and proud of how far you've come. You raised a generation and it feels so odd to see you as an actual adult now. I hope you keep thriving

this video made me realize that these vlogs aren't for us but for that amazing boy that will soon be with us all. thank you for being a true inspiration so men across the world and showing us what it really takes to be a man. you have helped shape me into the man I am today and although we may never meet you will hold a special place in my heart. Thanks Pewds and congrats on the boy!

my heart is so full watching these vlogs documenting their peaceful lives, just enjoying each other’s company, going to new places, and spending time with the pups. i’ve been a pewdiepie fan since 5th grade and i will continue to be one until i die. so happy for you both and your beautiful baby boy coming soon :)
We witnessed how this dude from Sweden grow. From his humble beginnings in youtube to his marriage and now to having a "baby pie". May Mrs. Pie have a  healthy delivery on the way!
Congrats to you all! even the pups!

Dude I'm going through a really tough time, feel extremely stressed lately, but theses videos..Man, they spark so much joy and keep making me feel calm. Just seeing Felix happy and this beautiful country makes me so happy, thanks for ur videos and letting us be part of your life pewds!
I never really watched Felix until recently. Congratulations man, good luck and blessings to you and your family!
I would pay to see Felix's child watching this video in the far future. It'd be so wholesome

As a dad of an 18 month old boy, all I can say is you are going to love this kid more than you can possibly imagine. I’m sure you know that already … but take that, multiply it by 1000, and that’s how it’ll be. I’m so happy for you guys!
Congratulations!
That is incredible Felix! Knowing about the culture in Japan and growing up around it, I know it exactly what that means! So happy to see you have a little one <3
It’s weird to be happy for people I’ve never met but this really bring me joy in my life. I have a 2 year old baby boy, congrats Felix and Marzia, all three of y’all deserve the world.

This video is so wholesome. I was 14 years old when I followed your journey with the  hilarious horror gameplays. Now 12 years later, being 26, watching you built such a happy and peaceful life for yourself with Marzia is incredibly touching and inspiring. Congratulations on your baby boy!!

I started watching your videos when I was 12 years old and now I’m 23. It’s actually insane to think about. A lot of people can relate to me about this, but I genuinely felt I grew up with you. You and your videos were one of the pinnacles of my happiness during my teen years and I’m so grateful for that. I feel elated to see you guys settle down to a life you fully deserve with a baby on the way. You guys genuinely look happy and contented, the same feelings I felt for more than 10 years from your content. 

To more wonderful adventures for the Kjellbergs. ️

I used to watch pewdiepie everytime I came back from school seeing him rage at barrels and do some random odd stuff it was fun. You raised millions of 9 year old army and now  he is blessed with one I can't. It's too wholesome <3

Congratulations on the baby boy!!! 
I wish Marzia a safe pregnancy journey, he is going to be so loved!
A Boy!  Congratulations!  All 6 of my boys and now 13 grandsons have grown up with you.  You are known in my family as the 7th son.  Great to see you starting your own family of little Pewds.  :)

I remember when pewds and marzia first got together. Seeing how far theyve come, their journey through the years, seeing how much they care for each other has been restoring my faith in humanity and love
I'm so proud of you Felix and Marzia, seeing you both get married and then having a child. This makes me cry in a good way. Watching you both since I was a kid made me happy, I wish you 2 the best
Somehow from 9yo to 19yo, his content grew along with us and now its just as wholesome as something can be. Best wishes to Felix and Marzia
congratulations on a baby boy, thank you for letting us be apart of your life in a small way.
Felix you’ve been a father to millions of kids around the world for years now thank you so much for putting smiles on our faces this whole time I hope your baby is happy and healthy.
We grew up with Edgar and Maya, now the future generation will grow up with Pewds child. Man where'd all the time go

Fingers crossed Marzia and the baby stay healthy and that bed rest doesn't drive her up the wall. Momo learning the stairs was so stinkin cute! With how gentle Felix is with the pups and how attentive he is to Marzia, I think he's gonna be a great Dad. It's wild how he went from yelling about barrels and Stefano in a dark room to going all over the world, being married, and now having a baby on the way. Congrats on having a mini pewds!

Literally have tingles right now thinking how much we, as viewers, have seen him grow. From streaming in a small room in Sweden to being in Japan, with amazing Marzia and now his SON!! Such a good nostalgia
At this point I feel like a proud parent, watching them all grow and get to this point.

been watching your vids since i was 9 years old back in 2011. It's crazy to have seen you grow from one of the first gaming channels with a smaller community to where you are now, seeing all of the support from your viewers/subscribers. I'm at the ripe age of 21 now and it's so crazy and great to see you still with marzia and now having a baby on the way. Your family deserves all of the great and positive outcomes this world has to give. I'm so proud of you pewds <3

Felix, ive watched you since i was 8, i turned 20 a few weeks ago. You wont see this, but thank you so much for being such a beautiful part of my life. I had a rough childhood, some of my best memories are watching your videos with an ice cold fanta after a long day of school, we all love you and know youll be the best dad you can be. Good luck to you and your family
The vlogs are so relaxing. Marzia's editing is a cherry on top. Glad to see Felix making the most out of his life

This guy is literally living the dream life. After years of working hard and not seeing the light of day he can finally enjoy his investment and enjoy life to the fullest. Being a dad, being a husband, sports, travelling....So inspiring to have witnessed his evolution. I wish the same to myself and to all the other bro' ! We will get there !
Makes me cry to see how far he and us have gotten. I will never forget pewds.

Marzia dancing into frame with a big smile in the end had me so warm and fuzzy inside.
Galet att ha sett alla videos sedan tejbz och Felix spelade ihop, till att vara på en helt annan plats i livet. Jag hoppas aldrig den här kanalen försvinner. Det är som en underbar påminnelse om resan vi gör på jorden
These videos are probably the happiest I can imagine someone being in life.  Extremely wholesome, I'm so proud of Felix

Many years later, when Felix’s child looks at this video to see what his father & mother were like when younger, I hope he sees the immeasurable amount of love and support from their fans that they’ve accumulated over the years.
I personally love the tranquil and joyous things that you do, rather than the huge projects Mr. Beast does. Can't wait for that 3d printing and electrical building video!

From watching you scream at barrel's, to starting a family, it's been an amazing adventure to watch y'all grow and be a part of YouTube history. All while making friends with the best bro's I know, I can't think of a better community, and thank you Felix for everyone you have helped, and amazing donation's to so many charities.
seeing pewds living his life happily reminds me of how fast time passes, im glad that he's enjoying his life with his family
I'm glad to see one person who has this much influence and riches settle down and be happy instead of chasing the bag until them or the entire world is dead
This is a much happier version of both Felix and Marzia. We are all so happy for you and your family. ️
Just moved to Tokyo as well and so crazy seeing the same things in your videos haha, I actually did voluntary work to help put up those fish! Congrats Marzia and Felix! So happy for you
His child is going to so cool when he can speak 4 languages by the age of 8. English, Italian, Swedish, and Japanese! Congratulations Pewds! Much love from my family to yours <3

In Japan, May 5th has long been celebrated as Tango no Sekku, also known as the Boys' Festival, which is a day to celebrate boys. Hinamatsuri, on the other hand, is a day to celebrate girls and is held on March 3rd. In 1948, May 5th was designated as a national holiday to celebrate the happiness of all children and was made into "Children's Day"
On Tango no Sekku, people raise carp-shaped streamers called "Koinobori", People display decorations such as May dolls and Kabuto (samurai helmets) at home.

During Japan's Edo period, there was a custom of raising flags and banners with family crests to celebrate the birth of a boy to the shogun. Eventually, this practice spread to all samurai and became a way to signify the birth of a boy. Later, among the common people in Edo, the idea of using carp as banners arose, and carp-shaped streamers"Koinobori", were raised among the townspeople in contrast to the samurai banners.
This is derived from a legend that a carp that successfully swims up a river's rapid currents known as the "Toryumon" is transformed into a dragon.

iv been watching PewDiePie since I was 4. Im 15 now. It's amazing to see that PewDiePie is going be a dad, almost brings tears to my eyes seeing how mature and different pewdiepie has become. He's living many peoples dreams and he earned it. the glazing is crazy
Just finished the video, god damn you made me tear up. Congratz on the little baby boy pewds and marzia. He will have beautiful and caring parents!

Seeing Marzia in full shot just made me so emotional :')
I'm also so happy that you get to do so many things, it's awesome!
Lots of love and good wishes to your beautiful family
